text: I know I'm talented, but I wasn't put here to sing. I was put here to be a wife and a mom and look after my family. I love what I do, but it's not where it begins and ends.
author: Amy Winehouse

text: When I was really young, my mom enrolled me in dance classes.
author: Jeff Bridges

text: I think my love of journalizing my life comes from my mom.
author: Jeff Bridges
